Articles.Content:
I have an interesting issue: The volume of one of soundtrack's song's is basically near muted while the other song is normal.
 
Does anyone have any idea what's causing this?
On what system are you playing KSP?

@klesh:

CPU: Xeon E3 1231 V3

RAM 16 GB

GPU: GTX 960

OS: Windows 10 x64 Build 14393.576

Okay, so not console versions, check.

Did you try validating the game's cache via steam (if you play through steam)?
If you figure this out I'd love to know how to mute the main menu music, I play with the music of just because of that track, can't stand it!
